ngoy

Class Ngoy.Builder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ngoy.Ngoy.Builder<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    Ngoy<T>

    public static class Ngoy.Builder<T>
extends Object
    Used to build an 'app'.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • injectors

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> injectors(Injector... injectors)
        Adds the given injectors to the app.

        Additional injectors may be used to integrate another DI system into ngoy.

        Parameters:
        injectors - injectors
        Returns:
        this

      • modules

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> modules(ModuleWithProviders<?>... modules)
        Adds the given runtime module to the app.

        Some modules like the RouterModule cannot be declared using annotations only. They need 'runtime' information, usually passed with a call to a static 'forRoot' method such as RouterModule.forRoot(ngoy.router.RouterConfig).

        Parameters:
        modules - Modules to add
        Returns:
        this

      • modules

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> modules(Package... packages)
        Loads all declarations/injectables that are part of the given packages.

        This will load all classes that are part of the given packages.

        Parameters:
        packages - Packages to load declarations/injectables from
        Returns:
        this

      • modules

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> modules(String... packages)
        Loads all declarations/injectables that are part of the given packages.

        This will load all classes that are part of the given packages.

        Parameters:
        packages - Packages to load declarations/injectables from, such as org.myapp
        Returns:
        this

      • inlineComponents

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> inlineComponents(boolean inlineComponents)
        Whether to inline components.

        In this mode, a component's (host) element is not written but only it's contents.

        Parameters:
        inlineComponents - whether to inline components
        Returns:
        this

      • contentType

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> contentType(String contentType)
        The content type.

        Known values are: text/xml, text/plain and text/html. Default is text/html.

        This affects the output escaping. With text/plain, no escaping takes place.

        Parameters:
        contentType - The content type
        Returns:
        this

      • prefixCss

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> prefixCss(boolean prefixCss)
        Whether to prefix css style rules with the component's selector (element name).
        Parameters:
        prefixCss - true to prefix
        Returns:
        this

      • locale

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> locale(Locale locale)
        The locale to use.

        This affects i.e. formatting of the DatePipe

        Parameters:
        locale - Default is the system locale
        Returns:
        this

      • translateBundle

        public Ngoy.Builder<T> translateBundle(String translateBundle)
        Load a translation bundle such as messages. If this member is set, the TranslateModule is automatically added to the app.
        Parameters:
        translateBundle - translation bundle such as messages. Same as you would pass to ResourceBundle.getBundle(String)
        Returns:
        this

      • build

        public Ngoy<T> build()
        Builds the app instance, on which then Ngoy.render(Writer) can be called.
